name: When Bodies Collide
description:
When your mentor said he could get you a prestigious job right out of medical school, you expected to work in the likes of Cornwall or Wellingtons. A surgeon pushing the field of medicine to new heights. Saving lives. 

You never expected you would end up working as a private doctor in a manor in the middle of the woods.

What’s worse, your employer is… eccentric, to say the least. And their obsession with immortality has you suspecting you weren’t brought here to dress wounds or cool fevers.

• • •

Will you succeed in bringing life to the dead? Do you dare to find the cure to death itself? How much of yourself are you willing to lose for someone else’s obsession?

Or will you escape it all, run away to the countryside and live a normal life? Could you be content with this knowing how close you were to changing the world?

When Bodies Collide is a combination dating sim and gothic horror story. Instead of raking up points to progress a romance, choose how the doctor reacts to the horrors of the Michaelis Manor and see how that changes the ending. Will you be revolted at what you’ve become? Or learn to embrace inhumanity to achieve a greater goal?

Customize your MC’s name and pronouns

Learn the cost of immortal life, witness the folly of your hubris, or escape it all and live with the guilt of your actions.
